text: Ara yadi amara etike ekati a'jami bhasana banatama tahale tara niscaya'i balata -- ''era ayatagulo kena pariskarabhabe bala haya ni? Ki! Ekati a'jami ebam ekajana arabiya!’’ Balo -- ''yara bisbasa kare tadera jan'ya eti eka pathanirdesa o eka arogya-bidhana.’’ Ara yara bisbasa kare na tadera kanera madhye rayeche badhirata, ara tadera jan'ya eti andhakaracchanna. Era -- edera daka haya bahu durera jayaga theke.
